DOC.brief_summary: In present study , investigator assess impact two different feed pattern ( continuous v intermittent ) insulin sensitivity muscle mass follow bedrest .
DOC.detailed_description: In present study , investigator assess impact two different feed pattern insulin sensitivity muscle mass follow bedrest . Healthy , young male feed continuous ( breaks food supply ) intermittent ( bolus throughout day ) manner .
DOC.criteria: BMI 18.5 35 Recreationally active Type 2 diabetes Performing progressive resistance train 6 month prior study Back/knee/leg problem Hypertension Use certain anticoagulant All co morbidity interact mobility muscle metabolism lower limbs Blood donation past 3 month
